```{r}
# Load data with nationality per author
library(readxl)
Author_Network_long_Nationality <- read_excel("~/Dokumente/Studium Bachelor Sport und Leistung/Bachelorarbeit/Network_Author_Analysis_Nationality.xlsx")


```


```{r}
#count unique authors (delete doubles of authors)
unique_authors <- unique(Author_Network_long_Nationality$author)
num_unique_authors <- length(unique_authors)

# output
cat("Anzahl unterschiedlicher Autoren:", num_unique_authors, "\n")
```
```{r}
# frequency of authors 
author_counts <- Author_Network_long_Nationality %>%
  count(author, sort = TRUE)

# output
print(author_counts)

author_counts %>% filter(n > 1)

## G. and N. Andrienko have only two publications!!!
```

```{r}
# count the number of authors per nationality
library(dplyr)

nationality_counts <- Author_Network_long_Nationality %>%
  group_by(nationality) %>%
  summarise(count = n_distinct(author)) %>%
  arrange(desc(count))

print(nationality_counts)

```
